description:
Soft and comfortable low-impact support, that lets you focus on what you’re doing, not what you’re wearing. Made from a supple recycled poly blend, and constructed in a fair trade factory, the Live Simply bra shows that sometimes simple is better.

  • Soft recycled polyester blend is gentle on sensitive skin, wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Mechanical stretch does away with the need for spandex, so it will last longer
  • HeiQ® Fresh durable odour control
  • Bonded seams glide against your skin
  • Double layers where you need support and single layers where you need cooling
name: Patagonia Live Simply Bra - Women's
